Name: Tomatini
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
2 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare black pepper and cherry tomato for garnish.
MUDDLE tomatoes in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Dust with grind of black pepper and garnish with a cherry tomato cut to sit on glass rim.
Review: A sweet and sour sipper that has to be tried. Delicate and yet assertive.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2011 by Jimmy Barrat at La Petite Maison Dubai (LPM) . This was also the signature cocktail Jimmy made for the 2012 World Class Bartenders' competition.
